metadata.title: CVE-2021-44420 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.description:
In Django 2.2 before 2.2.25, 3.1 before 3.1.14, and 3.2 before 3.2.10, HTTPrequests for URLs with trailing newlines could bypass upstream accesscontrol based on URL paths.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-44420` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-django - 2:2.2.12-1ubuntu0.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:2.2.12-1ubuntu0.8').
